name: Cookbook
long-desc: This tool allows you to store, read, and use recipes that you learn about. No matter how complex a recipe is, cooking it will be a snap with our step-by-step recipe tool! You can store an ingredients list and a list of steps. Later, when you decide to cook the recipe, our step-by-step tool will let you stay on-track with handy measuring guides and built-in timers!
